chunks.cleaned_english_translation:
<speak>
  
    On the Assumption of Saint Mary. <break time="500ms"/> The Virgin Mother of God, taken from her pure body, has passed into the rest of the Lord. <break time="500ms"/> May she help us with her prayers to enter that rest. <break time="500ms"/> May the gracious offspring of the eternal virgin grant this.
  
</speak>
chunks.original_latin:
In Assumptione sanctae Mariae. Virgo Dei genitrix de corpore ducta pudico
In requiem Domini transiit ecce sui. Ad quam nos precibus transire juvantibus ejus
Aeternae proles virginis alma velit.
